title: Epic celebrates "the end of the Apple Tax" after court win in iOS payments case
author: nobody9999
aiHeadline: Epic's victory over Apple's 'tax' is a win for developers, but don't expect your apps to suddenly become free.

title: The Tor Project is switching to Rust
author: giuliomagnifico
aiHeadline: Tor finally decides to switch to Rust, because who doesn't want their privacy protected by a language that's basically a safety-first enthusiast.

title: SQLite JSON at full index speed using generated columns
author: upmostly
aiHeadline: SQLite's new JSON indexing feature is so fast, it might just make your database jealous of your morning coffee.

title: Koralm Railway
author: fzeindl
aiHeadline: The Koralm Railway project is so on time, it's practically a metaphor for Austrian efficiency.

title: Id Software devs form "wall-to-wall" union
author: simjue
aiHeadline: Id Software devs form a 'wall-to-wall' union, proving that even Doom slayers need a break from the demons.
